祝箸: (いわいばし) - festive chopsticks; thick round chopsticks used on festive occasions
祝融: (しゅくゆう) - ancient Chinese god of fire (or spring); (disastrous) fire
祝詞: (のと) - {Shinto} ritual prayer/invocation of the gods participating in a rite; (しゅくし only)  congratulatory address
祝酒: (いわいざけ) - celebratory drink; celebratory spirits; holiday cheer
神: (Shin/jin/kami) - god , god, deity, divinity, spirit, kami; incredible, fantastic, amazing
神々しい: (こうごうしい) - divine; sublime; solemn
神かけて: (かみかけて) - swear by god; absolutely
神がかり: (かみがかり) - divine possession; eccentric behavior; fanaticism
神さび: (かんさび) - behaving like a god
神さびる: (かみさびる) - to have an air of sublimity; to appear majestic
神なぎ: (かんなぎ) - (巫 is esp. female and 覡 male) medium; diviner; shaman; oracle
神に仕える: (かみにつかえる) - to serve God
神に入る: (しんにいる) - to be divinely skilled
神のみぞ知る: (かみのみぞしる) - God only knows; It's anyone's call; Heaven knows
神の下し給うた物: (かみのくだしたもうたもの) - godsend; heavenly gift
神の使い: (かみのつかい) - divine messenger; messenger of a god (esp. an animal messenger)
神の子: (かみのこ) - Son of God (i.e. Jesus Christ or a Christian)
神の存在証明: (かみのそんざいしょうめい) - arguments for the existence of God
神の徳を歌った歌: (かみのとくをうたったうた) - poem in praise of God
神の言: (かみのことば) - Word of God/God's Word/sword of the Spirit; Logos (i.e. the Trinity incarnate in Jesus Christ)
神の言葉: (かみのことば) - Word of God/God's Word/sword of the Spirit; Logos (i.e. the Trinity incarnate in Jesus Christ)
神も仏もない: (かみもほとけもない) - There is no God! (used to express despair at the heartlessness of the world); there is no god or Buddha
神を尊ぶ: (かみをたっとぶ) - to revere God
神を敬う: (かみをうやまう) - to revere God
神を畏れる: (かみをおそれる) - to fear God
神世七代: (かみよななよ) - seven generations of (celestial) gods
神主: (かむぬし) - {Shinto} Shinto priest; {Shinto} chief Shinto priest (of a shrine); Welsh onion/pun in Buddhist monk jargon
神亀: (しんき) - (しんき only)  mysterious turtle (an omen of good luck); Jinki era (724.2.4-729.8.5)/Shinki era
神事相撲: (しんじずもう) - {sumo} sumo performed as part of Shinto harvest festivities
神人: (じにん) - (しんじん only) gods and men; (しんじん only) godlike person/person as powerful as a god/person as refined as a god; low-ranking Shinto priest
神仏: (かみほとけ) - gods and buddhas/gods and Buddha; (しんぶつ only) Shinto and Buddhism
神仏分離: (しんぶつぶんり) - (yoji)  separation of Buddhism and Shintoism (government policy during the beginning of the Meiji period)
神仏同体説: (しんぶつどうたいせつ) - kami-buddha syncretization theory (e.g. manifestation theory)
神仏混淆: (しんぶつこんこう) - (yoji) mixture (synthesis) of Buddhism and Shintoism
神仏習合: (しんぶつしゅうごう) - syncretism of Shinto and Buddhism
神仏隔離: (しんぶつかくり) - separation of Buddhism and Shintoism
神仙: (しんせん) - immortal mountain wizard (in Taoism)/Taoist immortal/supernatural being; (in Japan) 11th note of the ancient chromatic scale (approx. C)
神仙思想: (しんせんしそう) - Shenxian thought (ancient Chinese folk belief in the existence of mountain wizards)
神代: (じんだい) - ancient time; age of the gods
神代七代: (かみよななよ) - seven generations of (celestial) gods
神代文字: (じんだいもじ) - ancient Japanese characters (regarded today as created at a much more recent date)
神代杉: (じんだいすぎ) - lignitized Japanese cedar; lignitised Japanese cedar
神伝: (しんでん) - teachings conveyed by the gods
神佑: (しんゆう) - heavenly protection; divine help
神体: (しんたい) - shintai; object of worship believed to contain the spirit of a deity, typically housed in a shrine
神使: (じんし) - messenger of god; divine messenger
神信心: (かみしんじん) - belief in god
神僊: (しんせん) - immortal mountain wizard (in Taoism)/Taoist immortal/supernatural being; (in Japan) 11th note of the ancient chromatic scale (approx. C)
神像: (しんぞう) - idol (i.e. carving or painting of a deity)
神儒仏: (しんじゅぶつ) - Shinto, Confucianism and Buddhism
神兵: (しんぺい) - soldier dispatched by a god; soldier under the protection of the gods
神具: (じんぐ) - {Shinto} votive objects for a home shrine; ritual article
神典: (しんてん) - writings about the gods; Shinto scripture (e.g. the Kojiki)
神凪: (かんなぎ) - (巫 is esp. female and 覡 male) medium; diviner; shaman; oracle
神出鬼没: (しんしゅつきぼつ) - (yoji) appearing in unexpected places and at unexpected moments; elusive; phantom
神別: (しんべつ) - clans supposedly descended from the gods
神前: (しんぜん) - before god; before an altar
神前に誓う: (しんぜんにちかう) - to pledge before God
神前結婚: (しんぜんけっこん) - Shinto wedding
神剣: (しんけん) - divine sword (one of the three sacred treasures)
神力: (じんりき) - divine power/sacred power/mysterious power; (しんりき only) Shinriki (variety of rice)
神助: (しんじょ) - assistance from the gods
神去月: (かみさりづき) - tenth lunar month
神名: (じんみょう) - name of a god; name of a shrine
神和ぎ: (かんなぎ) - (巫 is esp. female and 覡 male) medium; diviner; shaman; oracle
神嘗の祭: (かんにえのまつり) - offering of the year's new rice harvest (imperial festival, October 17)
神嘗祭: (しんじょうさい) - offering of the year's new rice harvest (imperial festival, October 17)
神器: (しんき) - sacred treasure; the three sacred treasures (sword, jewel, mirror)
神国: (しんこく) - land of the gods; Japan
神在月: (かみありづき) - (term used in Izumo Province)  tenth month of the lunar calendar
神域: (しんいき) - Shinto shrine precincts; holy precincts/sanctuary
神境: (しんきょう) - grounds of a Shinto shrine; enchanted land/abode of immortals and gods
神奈川県: (かながわけん) - Kanagawa prefecture (Kanto area)
神威: (しんい) - god's majesty; god's authority; might of Heaven
神子: (みこ) - {Shinto} miko/shrine maiden/young girl or woman (trad. an unmarried virgin) who assists priests at shrines; medium/sorceress/shamaness
